definition: to have lost both one's parents
to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased

sentences.english: What can they do since the children's parents were died.
sentences.chinese: 既然孩子們的父母雙亡，他們怎麼辦？

sentences.english: MM: I was born to noble parents, but orphaned at a young age.
sentences.chinese: 我在一個貴族家裏出生，但是很小的時候父母雙亡。

sentences.english: Parents died, and that's what we are.
sentences.chinese: 父母雙亡，那就是我們的。

sentences.english: She adopted a child whose parents were dead.
sentences.chinese: 她收養了一個父母雙亡的孩子。

sentences.english: Heart not satisfying what parents are dead blow fainted in, was sent to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 心怡禁受不住父母雙亡的打擊昏倒在地，被送進醫院。

sentences.english: Are you an orphan, I have parents.
sentences.chinese: 你是個孤兒，而我也父母雙亡。

sentences.english: The little girl had come upon the parish ever since her parents died.
sentences.chinese: 小姑娘父母雙亡後，就一直靠教區的接濟生活。

sentences.english: Her parents died when she was a baby and she was brought up by her aunt.
sentences.chinese: 她出生後不久父母雙亡，是由姑母養大的。

sentences.english: After the girl's parents died, she was made a ward of her uncle and aunt.
sentences.chinese: 這女孩的父母雙亡後，舅父和舅母成了她的監護人。

sentences.english: Dai 3 brother parents double die, depend on each other from now on.
sentences.chinese: 戴氏三兄弟父母雙亡，從此相依爲命。

sentences.english: Mr. and Mrs. Williams adopted a child whose parents were dead.
sentences.chinese: 威廉斯先生和夫人收養了一個父母雙亡的孩子。

sentences.english: Unless their parents having died, and the orphanage can not accept these orphans .
sentences.chinese: 而除非他們父母雙亡，孤兒院又不能接受這些遺孤。

sentences.english: What should they do as the children's parents had already dead.
sentences.chinese: 既然孩子們的父母雙亡，他們怎麼辦？

sentences.english: But I fear the loss of her parents…
After his parents' death, the court made him a ward of his aunt.
sentences.chinese: 自從他父母雙亡後，法院把監護權給了他姑媽。

sentences.english: Orphaned at an early age gain and, from a poor family, such as washing.
sentences.chinese: 黃進芳自幼父母雙亡，家貧如洗。

definition: to adopt/to give for adoption (usually to a childless relative)
to be orphaned of one's father
offspring a famous family (idiom); good breeding/blue blood
not having to worry about clothes and food (idiom)/to be provided with the basic necessities
to look up and see no-one familiar (idiom); not having anyone to rely on/without a friend in the world
Laiyang county level city in Yantai 煙台|烟台, Shandong
